sense.def:
To shift something somewhere
pomeni tisto stvar nekam prestaviti.

seg.quote: He shifted the chair closer to the bed.
Muller's eyes shifted to the telephone.

sense.def:
A shift
je sprememba okoliščin ali mnenja neke osebe.

seg.quote: You may detect a shift of emphasis.

sense.def:
Kadar okoliščine ali mnenje
shifts
, se spremeni.

seg.quote: The talk shifted to our neighbour's land.

sense.def:
A shift
je tudi eno izmed stalnih obdobij, ko človek dela, na primer v tovarni.

seg.quote: He had chosen the midnight to 8 shift.
